cards.title: Revisionist History
body: At the start of the game, put this card into play. This card and cards underneath it are indestructible.
Increase damage dealt by Imperial cards by 1.
When there are 3 cards under this one, each hero target regains 8 HP and each player may return a card from their trash to their hand. Then, remove this card and all cards under it from the game.
cards.flavorText: “So, what kind of wacky alternate world is{BR}this supposed to be?” Ryan asked. “You don't{BR}understand. I visited these coordinates{BR}yesterday. It was a bright future. [b]Our[/b] future.”

flavorQuotes.text: So, what kind of wacky alternate world is{BR}this supposed to be?
You don't{BR}understand. I visited these coordinates{BR}yesterday. It was a bright future. [b]Our[/b] future.

cards.title: Campaign of Terror
body: At the end of the environment turn, reveal cards from the top of the environment deck until an Imperial target is revealed. Put that target into play. Shuffle the other revealed cards back into the deck.
At the start of the environment turn, if there are at least 3 Imperial targets in the environment trash and none in play, move this card under the Timeline card.
cards.flavorText: “How can we prove ourselves to people who've{BR}been taught to fear and despise us? The same{BR}way we always do. We fight for what's right,{BR}and let them draw their own conclusions.”

flavorQuotes.text: How can we prove ourselves to people who've{BR}been taught to fear and despise us? The same{BR}way we always do. We fight for what's right,{BR}and let them draw their own conclusions.

cards.title: Constant Surveillance
body: Damage dealt by Imperial cards is irreducible.
At the end of the environment turn, if there are no other Imperial targets in play, play the top card of the environment deck.

cards.title: Crucial Defeat
body: Increase damage dealt to Dissenters by 1.
When this card is destroyed, if it has 0 or fewer HP, move it under the Timeline card.
This card is immune to damage dealt by non-hero cards.
If a villain target was dealt damage this turn, reduce damage dealt to this card by 2.
cards.flavorText: “I don't understand. That's not how it{BR}happened, but I can't see why...” “Then we'll{BR}have to make our own adjustments.”

flavorQuotes.text: I don't understand. That's not how it{BR}happened, but I can't see why...
Then we'll{BR}have to make our own adjustments.

cards.title: Darkened Monitor
body: At the end of the environment turn, destroy a hero Ongoing card. Then, this card deals the {H - 1} non-Imperial targets with the highest HP 1 lightning damage each.
cards.flavorText: “Steven, it's me, it's TJ--” Torrent pleaded,{BR}but the specially uniformed agent was{BR}already leveling his visor at them.{BR}“It's Agent Craig to you, [i]Torrent.[/i]”

flavorQuotes.text: Steven, it's me, it's TJ--
It's Agent Craig to you, [i]Torrent.[/i]

cards.title: Dino Cavalry
body: Reduce damage dealt to this card by 1.
At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the hero with the most cards in play {H - 2} melee damage. Destroy an Equipment card belonging to a hero dealt damage this way.
cards.flavorText: “Oh, I can sense the distortion in the timeline!”{BR}the Idealist repeated mockingly while{BR}dodging blaster fire. “What, the cyborg{BR}samurai and dino cops were too subtle?”

flavorQuotes.text: Oh, I can sense the distortion in the timeline!
What, the cyborg{BR}samurai and dino cops were too subtle?

cards.title: Fabricated Disaster
body: Whenever a hero uses a power that deals damage, reduce that damage by 1.

At the end of the environment turn, one player may discard their hand. If {H + 3} or more cards were discarded this way, each player with no cards in hand draws 2 cards, then move this card under the Timeline card.
cards.flavorText: “But we've studied M'kk's abilities. He [i]can't[/i]--”{BR}“I know. But we can't fix this without finding{BR}out what [b]did[/b] cause it. Without proof, we're{BR}just another subversive gang with powers.”

flavorQuotes.text: But we've studied M'kk's abilities. He [i]can't[/i]--
I know. But we can't fix this without finding{BR}out what [b]did[/b] cause it. Without proof, we're{BR}just another subversive gang with powers.

cards.title: Infiltration Drone
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the character card target with the second lowest HP {H - 2} projectile damage.
cards.flavorText: {Subversive activity detected}{BR}{Intervention authorized}{BR}{Disguise selected} {Projection active}{BR}{Approaching targets...}

cards.title: Learn from History
body: When this card enters play, reveal cards from the top of the environment deck until a Divergence is revealed. Put that Divergence into play. Shuffle the other revealed cards back into the deck.
Then, if there are no Divergences in play, each player draws a card and play the top card of the environment deck.
Then, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “This is not a natural chain of events, I can{BR}sense it.” La Comodora was tapping away at{BR}one of her gadgets. “Someone steered this{BR}world down this path. We need to know who, and how.”

flavorQuotes.text: This is not a natural chain of events, I can{BR}sense it.
Someone steered this{BR}world down this path. We need to know who, and how.

cards.title: Reclusive Informant
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals itself 2 psychic damage. One player may destroy an Equipment card to reduce this damage by 2.
At the start of the environment turn, one player may draw 3 cards.
cards.flavorText: “Time travel!” Mantey exclaimed. “Didn't I tell{BR}you? This isn't the first time our world's been{BR}rearranged, and it won't be the last!” Despite{BR}his reputation, this time no one was laughing.

flavorQuotes.text: Time travel!
Didn't I tell{BR}you? This isn't the first time our world's been{BR}rearranged, and it won't be the last!

cards.title: Subjugated Masses
body: X on this card = the number of Imperial targets in play.
At the end of the environment turn, this card deals itself X + 2 psychic damage unless one player discards a card.
At the start of the environment turn, if X is less than this card's HP, one player may play an Ongoing or Equipment card.
cards.flavorText: Benchmark was used to people stopping to{BR}stare when he went out in full costume, but{BR}not like this. This world's people shrank back{BR}from him in fear- of what, he couldn't say.

cards.title: Surprise Raid
body: When this card enters play, each player may discard a card or destroy one of their cards in play. If they do, reduce damage dealt to targets from their deck by this card by 2.
At the end of the environment turn, this card deals each non-Imperial target 2 melee damage. Then, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “Freeze! Hands up, powers down!” boomed a{BR}voice as the agents stormed the lobby.{BR}Several of the heroes complied. Fanatic{BR}was not among them.

flavorQuotes.text: Freeze! Hands up, powers down!

cards.title: Unseen Hand
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the non-Imperial target with the second highest HP {H - 2} projectile damage. Reduce damage dealt by a target dealt damage this way by 1 until the start of the environment turn.
cards.flavorText: “This is Jones. Targets sighted,” the uniformed{BR}agent reported. “Either they're the world's{BR}least tasteful cosplayers, or there's been a{BR}jailbreak we didn't hear about.”

flavorQuotes.text: This is Jones. Targets sighted,
Either they're the world's{BR}least tasteful cosplayers, or there's been a{BR}jailbreak we didn't hear about.

cards.title: Uprising
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals each non-hero, non-Dissenter target 1 melee damage.
If there are any cards under the Timeline card, damage dealt by this card is irreducible.
cards.flavorText: “I don't get what's so surprising,” Absolute{BR}Zero said. “We all know children are the{BR}future.” The four-foot-tall rebel leader just{BR}glared. “And geezers like you are history.”

flavorQuotes.text: I don't get what's so surprising,
We all know children are the{BR}future.
And geezers like you are history.
